method.text: Cut the outer leaves from the cabbage so you are just using the centre heart. Shred the cabbage heart finely.

Heat the butter in a pan. Toss in the cabbage and onions to coat thoroughly in the butter. Season well. Arrange in the bottom of a shallow casserole dish. Arrange the pork chops on top of the vegetable mixture. Sprinkle with herbs and nutmeg.
Pour the cider over the top of the meat to flavour it and keep it moist. Cover the casserole tightly with a lid or foil. Cook inthe centre of the oven for 50 min, or until meat is very tender.

Meanwhile, wipe the apples, core and cut into thin rings. Heat the butter in a large frying pan. Fry the apple rings for 1-3 min or until just tender. Sprinkle with the sugar. Arrange round the edge of the casserole dish before serving.
